content.text: is designed to aggregate and summarize billing data from the

table. It provides a consolidated view of energy consumption, demand, and other billing-related metrics, categorized by billing period and cover sheet record type. The view is structured to produce three distinct sets of results, each representing different billing scenarios: UMB Rebill, UMB Cancel, and UMB Net Bill. These scenarios are differentiated by the
column and are aggregated using SQL scalar functions to determine the cover sheet record type and description.
The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following factors:

: It can be used by financial analysts to track energy consumption and demand trends, by billing departments to verify and reconcile billing records, and by management for strategic planning and reporting.

: Ensure that only authorized users have access to this view, as it contains sensitive billing information.
